segments.text: The Spring Festival is drawing close . By then we will have five days off . I am expecting it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me something about the Spring Festival ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just like you celebrate Christmas , we celebrate our lunar New Year's Day , the Spring Festival . It is a time for the family members and relatives to have a get-together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Christmas is also a special time for us to have the family reunion and to express our best wishes to those we love and those who love us in the coming new year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Christmas has more religious nature , while our Spring Festival is a more traditional holiday . On the New Year's Eve , we have a big dinner called ' Family Reunion Dinner ' . One of the traditional food to eat at the dinner is dumplings . After that , the adults usually sit chatting , watching TV , or playing cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They usually go outside to play firecrackers and fireworks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard one of the purposes to do it is to frighten the devils so they will not come to do any harm to people in the next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps it is like what people told you . At 24 hours midnight , the time when the New Year really comes , we exchange ' Happy New Year ' to each other , and parents and grandparents will take out small packages wrapped with red paper , in them are some what we call ' Lucky Money .
segments.speaker: S1
